sections.text:
RCW 62A.1-106

Use of singular and plural; gender.

In this title, unless the statutory context otherwise requires:(1) Words in the singular number include the plural, and those in the plural include the singular; and(2) Words of any gender also refer to any other gender.

In this title, unless the statutory context otherwise requires:

(1) Words in the singular number include the plural, and those in the plural include the singular; and

(2) Words of any gender also refer to any other gender.

[ 2012 c 214 s 106; 1965 ex.s. c 157 s 1-106. Cf. former: RCW 63.04.730; 1925 ex.s. c 142 s 72; RRS s 5836-72.]

Application—Savings—2012 c 214: See notes following RCW 62A.1-101.

Application—Savings—2012 c 214: See notes following RCW 62A.1-101.

RCW 62A.1-107

Section captions.

Section captions are part of this title.

Section captions are part of this title.

[ 2012 c 214 s 107; 1965 ex.s. c 157 s 1-107. Cf. former RCW sections: (i) RCW 62.01.119(3); 1955 c 35 s 62.01.119; prior: 1899 c 149 s 119; RRS s 3509. (ii) RCW 62.01.120(2); 1955 c 35 s 62.01.120; prior: 1899 c 149 s 120; RRS s 3510. (iii) RCW 62.01.122; 1955 c 35 s 62.01.122; prior: 1899 c 149 s 122; RRS s 3512.]

Application—Savings—2012 c 214: See notes following RCW 62A.1-101.
